intro: Charge, smash, and conquer the city as a mighty ram.
description:
Step into the hooves of a fearless ram and bring chaos wherever you go! Roam freely across bustling city streets, quiet suburbs, sprawling farms, and towering mountain slopes. Smash, ram, and fling anything in your path — from unsuspecting NPCs to random objects — all while completing quirky quests and unlocking achievements.
In Ram Simulator, the story is yours. No rules, no limits — just your horns, your unstoppable energy, and a mischievous tongue that can grab, toss, and wreak havoc on anything. Leap across rooftops, race down hills, and activate slow-motion to savor every epic moment of destruction.

Key Features:
• Open-World Mayhem: Explore vibrant cities, farms, and mountains — the entire world is your playground.
• Ultimate Destruction: Ram, drag, and fling objects or NPCs to create hilarious chaos.
• Epic Stunts & Tricks: Jump rooftops, perform daring stunts, and find creative ways to explore.
• Slow-Motion Fun: Turn every crash and toss into cinematic, jaw-dropping moments.
• Customizable Ram: Personalize your ram with funny and stylish cosmetic options.
• Quests & Achievements: Complete wacky challenges and unlock rewards for your destructive adventures.

The suburbs have no idea what’s coming — are you ready to show them the true power of a ram? Laugh, smash, and embrace absurdity in every horn-charging moment!
